InstructionData.Title: LIFE - Life Support
InstructionData.Author: rotiking(warg)
InstructionData.Instructions: # Life Support 1.0 https://github.com/dtandersen/sta​ alias GasSensor d0​ alias O2Valve d1​ alias CO2Valve d2​ alias N2Valve d3​ alias Unused d4​ alias Unused d5​ ​ alias pressure r0​ # room pressure​ alias partial r1 # partial pressure of element​ alias ratio r2 # ratio of element​ alias o2on r3​ alias co2on r4​ alias n2on r5​ alias lowPressure r6​ alias minPressure r7​ alias maxPressure r8​ alias o2Pressure r9​ alias co2Pressure r10​ alias n2Pressure r11​ ​ move minPressure 50​ move maxPressure 101.325​ move o2Pressure 22​ move co2Pressure 0.4​ move n2Pressure 79​ ​ start:​ yield​ ​ l pressure GasSensor Pressure​ slt lowPressure pressure minPressure​ ​ # co2 regulation​ l ratio GasSensor RatioCarbonDioxide​ mul partial pressure ratio​ slt co2on partial co2Pressure​ or co2on co2on lowPressure​ s CO2Valve On co2on​ ​ # oxygen regulation​ l pressure GasSensor Pressure​ l ratio GasSensor RatioOxygen​ mul partial pressure ratio​ slt o2on partial o2Pressure​ or o2on o2on lowPressure​ s O2Valve On o2on​ ​ # nitrogen regulation​ l pressure GasSensor Pressure​ l ratio GasSensor RatioNitrogen​ mul partial pressure ratio​ slt n2on partial n2Pressure​ or n2on n2on lowPressure​ s N2Valve On n2on​ ​ j start
